verbose_text: However, intracellular glucose does not appear to enter glycolysis because transcript levels of the key enzyme glyceraldehyde 3-phosphate dehydrogenase (GAPDH), which catabolizes the conversion of glucose 1,3 biphospate to 1,3-bisphosphoglyceric acid and fosters glycolysis, were reduced (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY B).
evidence: levels of the key enzyme glyceraldehyde 3-phosphate
